message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its worth $10000 to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to a better agreement. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9500.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $11000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into acquiring it.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my valuation of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $10500.

I understand that you're close to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and propose a price of $11250. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into acquiring it.
